gamerule.localizedweather_stormChance.de: The chance a storm can spawn, higher numbers means a lower spawn chance
gamerule.localizedweather_stormMaxSpawnD: The maximum distance a storm is allowed to spawn from a player
gamerule.localizedweather_stormMinSpawnT: The minimum amount of time that must pass after a storm has spawned for the game to being rolling for spawns again, in ticks
